mapper.insert: insert into rv (rv_no, user_id, pst_se, rv_ymd, rv_cn, rv_yn, dl_no) values(#{rvNo}, #{userId}, #{pstSe}, CURRENT_DATE, #{rvCn}, #{rvYn}, #{dlNo})
mapper.select: select distinct r.* from rv r join deal d on r.dl_no = d.dl_no where user_id = #{userId};
